Translations.Text: Am Yaquluna Aftarahu Qul Fa'tu Bi`ashri Suwarin Mithlihi Muftarayatin Wa Ad`u Mani Astata`tum Min Duni Allahi 'In Kuntum Sadiqina
Fa'illam Yastajibu Lakum Fa`lamu 'Annama 'Unzila Bi`ilmi Allahi Wa 'An La 'Ilaha 'Illa Huwa Fahal 'Antum Muslimuna
Man Kana Yuridu Al-Hayaata Ad-Dunya Wa Zinataha Nuwaffi 'Ilayhim 'A`malahum Fiha Wa Hum Fiha La Yubkhasuna
Ula'ika Al-Ladhina Laysa Lahum Fi Al-'Akhirati 'Illa An-Naru Wa Habita Ma Sana`u Fiha Wa Batilun Ma Kanu Ya`maluna

Afaman Kana `Ala Bayyinatin Min Rabbihi Wa Yatluhu Shahidun Minhu Wa Min Qablihi Kitabu Musa 'Imamaan Wa Rahmatan 'Ula'ika Yu'uminuna Bihi Wa Man Yakfur Bihi Mina Al-'Ahzabi Falnnaru Maw`iduhu Fala Takun Fi Miryatin Minhu 'Innahu Al-Haqqu Min Rabbika Wa Lakinna 'Akthara An-Nasi La Yu'uminuna
Wa Man 'Azlamu Mimmani Aftara `Ala Allahi Kadhibaan 'Ula'ika Yu`raÄ‘una `Ala Rabbihim Wa Yaqulu Al-'Ash/hadu Ha'uula' Al-Ladhina Kadhabu `Ala Rabbihim 'Ala La`natu Allahi `Ala Az-Zalimina
Al-Ladhina Yasudduna `An Sabili Allahi Wa Yabghunaha `Iwajaan Wa Hum Bil-'Akhirati Hum Kafiruna
